name: homebridge-grumptech-timetriggers
description: Time-based triggers for use with Homebridge

remarks: The 'plugin' and 'platform' names MUST match the names called out in the 'platforms' section of the active config.json file.
If these values are changed, the module will need to be rebuilt. Run 'npm run build'.

scripts.prepare: npm run docs; npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run docs; npx webpack --mode=production
scripts.docs: docDir='./docs'; [[ -e "$docDir" ]] && rm -rf "$docDir/"*; mkdir -p ./pages; wait; cp ./security.md ./pages/; wait; cp ./license.md ./pages/; wait; npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.conf.json --destination "$docDir/"
scripts.docs-dev: docDir='./docs-dev'; [[ -e "$docDir" ]] && rm -rf "$docDir/"*; mkdir -p ./pages; wait; cp ./security.md ./pages/; cp ./license.md ./pages/; npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.conf.json --destination "$docDir/" --private

author: GrumpTech (Michael J. Price)
